input: Please update the following program based on this instruction: Did you follow my instruction to do the following things? If not you need to do:Radius_I is the speed of the ball. When RadiusI changes to a new value, the speed of the ball also changes to that value. Current program: from vpython import * # Parameter settings size, L, t, dt = 1, 10, 0, 0.01 # Display settings scene = canvas(width=800, height=800, x=0, y=0, center=vector(0, 0, 0), background=vector(1, 1, 1)) cube = box(pos=vector(0, 0, 0), size=vector(size, size, size), color=color.blue) floor = box(pos=vector(0, -0.5*size, 0), size=vector(L, 0.01, 10*size), color=color.green) gd = graph(width=600, height=450, x=0, y=300, xtitle='t (s)', ytitle='x (m)', background=vector(0.5, 0.5, 0)) xt = gcurve(graph=gd, color=color.red) gd2 = graph(width=600, height=450, x=0, y=0, xtitle='t (s)', ytitle='v (m/s)', background=vector(0.5, 0.5, 0)) vt = gcurve(graph=gd2, color=color.blue) # Initialize the speed of the cube Radius_I = 1 # Object motion while cube.pos.x <= 0.5*L - 0.5*size: rate(1000) cube.velocity = vector(Radius_I, 0, 0) cube.pos = cube.pos + cube.velocity*dt xt.plot(pos=(t, cube.pos.x)) vt.plot(pos=(t, cube.velocity.x)) t += dt
output: from vpython import * # Parameter settings size, L, t, dt = 1, 10, 0, 0.01 # Display settings scene = canvas(width=800, height=800, x=0, y=0, center=vector(0, 0, 0), background=vector(1, 1, 1)) cube = box(pos=vector(0, 0, 0), size=vector(size, size, size), color=color.blue) floor = box(pos=vector(0, -0.5*size, 0), size=vector(L, 0.01, 10*size), color=color.green) gd = graph(width=600, height=450, x=0, y=300, xtitle='t (s)', ytitle='x (m)', background=vector(0.5, 0.5, 0)) xt = gcurve(graph=gd, color=color.red) gd2 = graph(width=600, height=450, x=0, y=0, xtitle='t (s)', ytitle='v (m/s)', background=vector(0.5, 0.5, 0)) vt = gcurve(graph=gd2, color=color.blue) # Initialize the speed of the cube cube.velocity = vector(1, 0, 0) # Object motion while cube.pos.x <= 0.5*L - 0.5*size: rate(1000) cube.pos = cube.pos + cube.velocity*dt xt.plot(pos=(t, cube.pos.x)) vt.plot(pos=(t, cube.velocity.x)) t += dt cube.velocity = vector(cube.pos.x, 0, 0)
